column1: Uchi////My husband and I are finally DINK's. That's right - Dual Income
column2: NO KIDS. After four years of graduate school
column3: husband landed himself a job! We've been savoring this moment for two years - that day when husband would land a job
column4: and we could go out and celebrate at the most expensive restaurant we could think of. As classy Montrosians (I made it up
column6: we of course settled on Uchi. We walked into the Industrial/Modern-decorated Japanese restaurant and I swear I felt like I'd arrived.
